title: IRCv4 server-to-client frame
description: Specification for the IRCv4 server-to-client frame

target.title: Object targeting
target.description: Message targets, including to and from

target.title: Target name
target.description: Name of the target; must be valid given the target type

server.title: Server name
server.description: Server this command was sent from

local.title: Local flag
local.description: Describes if the command originated from a federated server

command.title: Command
command.description: Action that has or is being performed

time.title: Command send time
time.description: Server-side time the command was sent to the client

id.title: Command ID
id.description: ID sent by the client for a command
id.$comment: Since IRCv4 is fully asynchronous, some actions may be deferred in what is known as a transaction, especially ones that may take a while to execute. Once the action completed, the ID used by the client for the triggering command will be sent back.

completed.title: Transaction completion status
completed.description: Describes whether or not a transaction is complete

success.title: Success flag
success.description: Whether or not the command was successful
success.$comment: Error information will be stored in parameters, including code
